name: ARRUDA
description:
"Rue"

The rue is a medicinal plant whose scientific name is Ruta Graveolens. In Brazil it has a very important meaning for rituals, beliefs and Afro-Brazilian religious traditions.

Around this plant there are beliefs that believe it has the power to remove the evil eye, envy and to block negative energies. The Rue behind the left ear has the function of protecting against the evil eye.

Considered an energetic plant, it absorbs everything that is bad into it, so that it does not affect those who take care of it and have it as a sacred plant.

It is also used as a blessing plant, to keep the body closed and offer spiritual protection. 

It is a plant with an extremely strong and very present fragrance, when you touch it you can feel its aroma from afar, its smell is what denounces it, there is no one who cannot identify a Rue. 

Pastel chalk and Digital Painting
2021
